adviseScripts.text: Hey, Rookie.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What do I need to do to sell products to people like you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Use your beauty.
Give a 75% discount.
Oh, my beauty?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Come over here, then. I will do anything you ask of me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I step toward Yan and get smacked with a fan.
I didn't know you drove such a hard bargain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: A 75% discount is like letting me give it to you for free.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: How about... around 45% discount? That way it's a win-win for both of us.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I spend materialistic counseling time with Yan.
Businesses should be honest. If not, you will be punished.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You should remind Dolla of that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Understood.
You should let Dolla walk her own path.
Thanks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Having a colleague in the squad who is an economic criminal could cause problems, if left unchecked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You...
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: ... Never mind. Since you're the commander, we'll do what you decide.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: But if her bad deeds come back to bite her on the butt, then you'll take half the blame.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Yan about squad colleagues.
Hey, Rookie.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Is there anything you want to eat right now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: 500g of the finest pork chop.
Anything is okay, if it's from you.
What is that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: How can it be so specific?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Well, I wasn't going to give you anything at first...
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: ... But for your sweet words, I'm gonna send you a special product.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Yan about the foods we like.
Rupee keeps trying to get me to make an appearance on her broadcast.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What should I do with her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Demand an appropriate share of the profit.
Just do it. She's your friend and squad mate, after all.
Ah. Great minds really do think alike.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I should get at least 30% of the ad profit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Then I'll buy an ad for our company, and it'll be even.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What in the world are you talking about?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Don't you know that the closer you are, the more clear you have to be about financial matters?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Yan about squad colleagues.
... Rookie, come over here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Do you want to be my secretary?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What are the conditions?
I decline.
The salary will be almost four times what you get now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Also, if the sales go up, I'll give you an incentive. Up to a maximum of 300% of your salary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You don't even have to do much. Just stay by my side and smile.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: ... I almost fall for it, but come to my senses after hearing the last part.
You are going to decline without even hearing the conditions?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: ... That is a shame.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I politely decline Yan's recruitment offer.
I heard there's a lot of valuable stuff on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Did you bring back anything, by any chance?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Just some sand.
Some Rapture parts.
Are you kidding me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: That... is in good condition. And the material... it's hard to find on the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Rookie. If you find things like that from now on, bring them to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Understand? Not to Dolla. Not to Rupee. Straight to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Yan about the treasures on the surface.
According to the intelligence services, the weather is bad on the surface today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Don't you think you should prepare something?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Like an umbrella, or a raincoat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What's your asking price?
Another gimmick...
Oh, it's a little expensive if you only buy one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: But if you buy umbrellas and raincoats for all six Nikkes going on the operation, a 30% discount can be applied.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: And you can't tell anyone else. Since you and I are so close, you know...
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I will give you a special additional boss discount of 10%.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What do you mean, gimmick?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What if you got soaked by rain, or got sick? You'll regret the money you tried to save.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: So buy now, before it's too late!
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I eventually fall for Yan's gimmick.
Hey, Rookie.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What do you think of Nikkes who talk with an accent?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Sounds cute.
Sounds strong.
Huh?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Cute?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I was thinking if you said you didn't like it, I'd try to change it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: But it looks like I don't have to change a thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Uh... Why?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I guess it might seem that way when arguing...
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: But, I've never raised my voice in front of you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Yan about her accent.
Your favorite color.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What is it? Tell me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Yellow.
Red.
Yellow...
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Just like Rupee.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Oh, red?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Then we're like two peas in a pod.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: ... Do you want to dress in red? Then we can look like a couple.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I have a small talk with Yan.
What do you think I'll be doing in 10 years?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You'll be monopolizing Ark's economy.
You'll be expanding your business on the surface.
... I'm doing that already. Even though it's limited to living necessities.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Which is to say... there isn't anything particularly new.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: ... That's the best answer I've heard so far.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Even if it's based on the premise that the surface needs to be recaptured,
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: having worked in the business for years, I'm sure I could do it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I discuss the future with Yan.
In your opinion,
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: what is the most important factor in success?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Perseverance.
Luck.
Effort?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: That's what I figured you would say.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: But no amount of perseverance will beat out luck.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Except for me, of course.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: We're on the same page in that respect.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I think just enough money and a bit of luck will help take you to the top.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: But I think I would have succeeded without it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Yan and I have a discussion about success.
There have been a lot of new TV shows about relationships.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Do you have a lot of dating experience?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I've been single my entire life.
I once had 12 relationships in a single day.
Wait, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You've never been in a relationship?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I didn't expect that from you! But nevertheless, I like your answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: ... Come again?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You're not serious, are you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You're completely psychotic!
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Yan and I talk about relationships.
Tell me,
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: has anything caught your eye as of late?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I want to make a note of it for when I release my next product.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You've caught my eye.
There isn't really anything I'm interested in.
Go on. Is there something you want from me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I'm all ears.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: A word of advice, Rookie: never start a business.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: With your mindset, you'll be bankrupt before the first quarter is over.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Yan and I talk about what interests us.
We just released a new flavor of soda, want to try it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Is it free?
I'm willing to try anything you offer me.
Nothing's free in this world.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: But I may reconsider if you do something that amuses me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Is that true?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I have to say, that's a nice little confidence booster.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: If you like it, just let me know. I'll give you as much as you want.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Thanks to Yan, I won't have to pay for any sodas in the near future.
I run into a lot of irate customers on the job.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Some of them really cross the line.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I'll take care of them for you.
You should give it right back to them.
Aw shucks, Rookie.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Thank you, even if you're just saying that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: That's easier said than done.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Besides, I don't want to stoop down to their level.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I listen to more of Yan's customer service nightmare stories.
When you look at me, what words pop in your head?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: A businesswoman who doesn't take crap from anyone.
An entrepreneur.
You actually feel that way about me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: That's fantastic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I mean, it is true that I'm an entrepreneur...
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, it's okay I guess.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I continue to think of suitable ways to describe Yan.
Are you someone who enjoys challenges themselves,
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: or do you prefer having a sense of stability?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I enjoy challenging myself
I enjoy a sense of stability
That's a good mindset to have.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You have to keep challenging yourself to grow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: That's how I operate as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Stability is nice, but if you're not careful, it can make you settle for less.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You should work on challenging yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Yan and I share a meaningful conversation.
Is there anything you've seen recently that you want to get your hands on?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Yan's heart.
Luxury brand watches.
You've become quite the flirt lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Well, how do you intend on getting it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Expensive watches?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I didn't know you were interested in that sort of thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Consider me surprised.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Yan and I talk about the things we want the most.
Rookie. Have you ever failed at something before?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: What's your definition of failure?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Failure is just another opportunity to try again.
I wouldn't know. I've never failed before.
Hmm... that sounds about right to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: If you fall, you just have to get back up again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: ... Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: So much confidence... I'm at a loss for words.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You are really something else.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Yan and talk about failure.
Do you know much about investing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I'm on the hunt for investment opportunities.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I hate red.
You're the only thing I want to invest in.
It looks like you are another victim.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: I don't think I'll be getting any advice from you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: You know your stuff.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: If I invest in you, I may not end up bankrupt after all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Yan

adviseScripts.text: Yan and I searched for companies to invest in.
